comment: Great pizza, the crust was crispy and the toppings were fresh.
The sushi was amazing, the fish was so fresh and the presentation was beautiful.
The burgers were okay, but the fries were really good.
The tacos were delicious, the meat was perfectly seasoned and the salsa was spicy.
The Pad Thai was disappointing, the noodles were overcooked and the sauce was bland.
The sushi was really good, but the service was a bit slow.
